original_text: The apostles did many miracles which showed that the power of God was with them. As a result, all the people were very surprised and afraid.
korean_text: 사람마다 두려워하는데 사도들로 말미암아 기사와 표적이 많이 나타나니

sentences.original_text: which showed that the power of God was with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님의 능력이 그들과 함께 있음을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, all the people were very surprised
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 모든 사람들이 매우 놀랐습니다
